oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Lady Helen Schechter to Thomas Hardy — On Dorchester plays & invitation to Melbury, 17 November [191?]
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Lady Helen Schechter (VIAF: https://viaf.org/viaf/19148138)
oai_dc:dc.dc:format: Manuscript letter; ink on paper; 4 pages
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Letter praising a Dorchester performance of Hardy’s plays and inviting him to visit Melbury.
oai_dc:dc.dcterms:provenance: Held by Dorset History Centre / Dorset Museum.
oai_dc:dc.dcterms:rights: Rights status uncertain; consult holding repository.
